original_text: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven, that one of these little ones should perish.
korean_text: 이와 같이 이 작은 자 중의 하나라도 잃는 것은 하늘에 계신 너희 아버지의 뜻이 아니니라

sentences.original_text: Even so it is not the will
of your Father which is in heaven
that one of these little ones
